channel.title: Xss on Fkbug
channel.description: Recent content in Xss on Fkbug

item.title: 0. XSS 基础
item.description: xss base: 关于引用的话要怎样才好看呢？ 关于应用首都基辅罗斯结果 Life and围殴的Game Fubk llall sldjflsj lwejl 态度，样式、颜色 你好啊，我的主题 正文字体预览Preface A Li你好1l Text 不知道要怎么个123难412看Fkbug法Life And Games Are full of bugs 公式： $${\sqrt {n}}\left(\left({\frac {1}{n}}\sum _{i=1}^{n}X_{i}\right)-\mu \right)\ {\xrightarrow {d}}\ N\left(0,\sigma ^{2}\right)$$ 行内公式： you have to include math expressions in a pair of backticks (inline: `$ $`; display style: `$$ $$`), e.g., $S_n = \sum_{i=1}^n X_i$ TODO: - [x] Write an R package. - [ ] Write a book.
